dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Trademark use violation]
dmca.body:
t 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of The Planet
Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Tuesday, April 25, 2006 4:38 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Trademark use violation]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Trademark use violation]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the address
of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Trademark use violation
Date:         Tue, 25 Apr 2006 14:54:28 -0400
From:         lqlink1@laquinta.com <lqlink1@laquinta.com>
To:         abuse@theplanet.com <abuse@theplanet.com>



*April 25, 2006*

*Abuse*

This letter is written concerning the unauthorized use of certain trademarks in
metatags, metadata, keywords, URLs, and/or file names in connection with your
website at http://www.floridadiscounthotels.ws/dab/La-Quinta-Inn-and-Suites.html.
Your immediate attention is requested in this matter.

La Quinta Worldwide, LLC (hereinafter referred to as La Quinta) is the owner of a
family of trademarks comprising the words "LA QUINTA"
(hereinafter collectively referred to as the trademark).  For over thirty-five
years, La Quinta has expended considerable effort and expense in offering quality
hotel and motel services under its* *trademark.  As a result, the trademark has come
to identify the services of La Quinta, and La Quinta enjoys valuable goodwill
attached to this trademark.  That goodwill is extremely important to La Quinta, and
it is equally important that La Quinta not permit use of any mark by another in such
a way as to cause a likelihood of confusion.

Consistent with La Quinta's extensive common-law rights in its trademark, La Quinta
is the owner of U.S. Trademark Registration Nos.
875,802; 1,080,641; 1,393,578; 1,393,579; 1,429,660; 1,823,440; 1,841,032;
2,298,693; 2,300,509; 2,575,959; 2,832,831; 2,855,754; and others.  The
aforementioned trademark registrations are valid and enforceable under Title 15 of
the United States Code.  Furthermore, the trademark LA QUINTA is a famous trademark
within the meaning of 15 U.S.C.
